caption.p: List of OTUs detected in the study, with their corresponding number of reads, best BLAST match according to the UNITE database (ver. 7.1, release 2018-08-22), taxonomic affiliation (genus level) and ecology according to the FINGuild ("-‚Äù = unassigned). The final taxonomic and ecological classification has been manually corrected to our best knowledge when needed.
